column3: Errementari: The Blacksmith and the Devil
column5: Kandido Uranga, Uma Bracaglia, Eneko Sagardoy, Ramón Agirre, Josean Bengoetxea, Gotzon Sánchez, José Ramón Argoitia, Gorka Aguinagalde, Iñigo de la Iglesia, Aitor Urtzelai
column11: Horror Movies, International Movies, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
column12: A brutal blacksmith tortures a demon he blames for his misery, unaware a trespassing orphan is about to change everything. Based on Basque folklore.
